participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, she enjoys being active and is eager to make friends.
participant_1.background: I am a french girl , but i moved to the us last year. I am in 3rd grade. I live with my parents and my little brother. I like to play soccer , draw and read asterix. I don t have too many friends in the us yet , but i am going to summer camp and i hope to make friends then ! i also think that i may make friends as soccer in the fall.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Motivated and adventurous, he enjoys physical activities and has a nurturing side.
participant_2.background: I prefer morning to night. My favorite fruit is an apple. I prefer winter over fall. I like to swim. I am a marathon runner.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, run marathons, and eat apples.
I like to read, play soccer, and draw.
That's cool! I used to draw when I was younger, but I haven't done it much lately.
I'm going to summer camp next week. I'm excited to make some new friends.
That sounds fun! I love summer camp. I went every summer when I was a kid.
I'm also going to play soccer in the fall. I hope to make some friends on my team.
That's great! I used to play soccer when I was younger, but I quit because I wasn't very good at it.
It doesn't matter if you're good at it. It's still a lot of fun.
I know, but I was always the last one picked for teams.
That's okay. You'll find a team that will want you.
